description: The combination of textures and spices make for an exciting and flavourful kebab.
keywords: Wrap,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free
name: Halloumi Kebab with Sriracha, Onions & Pickles Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small red onion, peeled and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a pan to a medium heat with the olive oil and pan fry the halloumi slices for 5 minutes, turning half way.
Slice the onions and pickles into bite size portions and set to one side. Place the pita breads into the oven to warm for 1 minute.
Remove the halloumi from the oven and allow drain on some kitchen paper. Stuff the pita with the halloumi and vegetables, then spread over the sriracha.
